abstract: Staying for love, fighting for the cause
description: Sheiny New first came to Australia from America on a special scholarship program. While here she met her future husband and never looked back. She has since become a passionate campaigner speaking out against domestic violence in the Jewish community. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000983; Stories from the Jewish Community; Active; 2007
